text: Yiannis Boutaris (Greek: Γιάννης Μπουτάρης; 13 June 1942 – 9 November 2024) was a Greek businessman and politician. He was the Mayor of Thessaloniki from 2011 to 2019. From 2003 to 2011 and again from January 2024 and until his death, he was a municipal councilor of Thessaloniki. Boutaris was an Independent. Boutaris was born in Thessaloniki. Boutaris died on 9 November 2024 in Thessaloniki from problems caused by hip surgery, aged 82. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Greek politicians Category:Greek businesspeople Category:Mayors Category:Independent politicians
title: Yiannis Boutaris
